Name: Black Spring
Ingredients: 30 ml Straight rye whiskey (100 proof /50% alc./vol.)
Instructions: STIR first 3 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with ginger beer and briefly stir.
Review: Ginger spice with a bittersweet fruity rye bread bite.
History: Believed to originate from Denver, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of Black Spring contains 222 calories
